name: Core API Release 36.1.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs which brings you with a new feature, an improvement and a few bug fixes.

ADDED.text: Access Token via Custom JWT Token API (Native Social Login) has been introduced to retrieve a LoginRadius access token via a custom JWT token.

IMPROVED.text: Improved the description for LoginRadius Error Code 1083 to provide clearer and more concise context.

FIXED.text: The issue with generating the access_token from the subsequently generated refresh_token in the case of the MS Live social provider has been resolved.
The conflict between the user's privacy policy acceptance status and the Update MFA by Access Token API (Google Authenticator) has been resolved.
